title: Andrew Adonis – 2021 Comments on State of Labour Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Adonis on 9 May 2021.
content: I don’t think some of my Labour friends realise how serious the stakes are. The Liberal party ceased to be a contender for power over a 6 year period of successive electoral catastrophes in the 1920s through poor leadership, exactly 100 years ago. It could be happening to us.
